tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Thank you Dr. Kartik Dutta for being the dedicated, thoughtful, and compassionate doctor that you are! In my  first visit this week couple of days back to your clinic at NDSE part  II, you went above and beyond my expectations. I feel so blessed to know you and have you as my doctor and will be back soon for my wife's dental care as well.
Regards
Rajesh Bathla (Batla)
Passionate Hotelier

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was really scared of getting an implant done. Dr. Kartik and Dr. Mansi Datta first reassured me that the procedure would be painless. They were both very calm and relaxed. The procedure itself was performed with great care and was painless. I have been comfortable after the procedure as well. 
Overall a 10/10 experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: My experience at Crown and Roots was amazing......I got two RCTs and few fillings done......and my experience in both was painless.....Dr. Kartik explains every procedure and is very calm in his work.....also everything at Crown and Roots was clean......and fitting of my crown is also perfect.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr Kartik suggested extraction of one of my molars and replacing it with dental implant. He explained all the pros and cons of the procedure. I must say I was comfortable asking him all kind of questions regarding the procedure and he explained all the queries very patiently. Really liked the way he handled my case. Dr Mansi inputs were valuable. Highly recommended .
reply_text: Thanks Mrs Suman for the positive feedback. We are glad that you are satisfied with your dental treatment . Keep Smiling :)

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I got a dental implant from crown and roots clinic. The planning was explained in detail and execution of treatment was perfect. I got a temporary crown immediately and after 3months permanent crown was cemented. Dr mansi is really professional and caring.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience with Dr.Kartik Datta was great as I was satisfied with the treatment I got. Above that he is very patient friendly, cooperative and explained everything regarding the treatment very nicely.One should surely visit crown & roots *** **** ****** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Kartik Datta was patient and empathetic in his treatment, which aren't usually things you associate with dental professionals. I visited him in an extreme situation of pain and got an RCT done which he treated for quite astutely despite the challenges and problems presented.He explained the processes at every step of the way and was not keen on doing multiple procedures for patient well-being and safety. He solved for pain relief which was the pressing problem and was fair and professional in his conduct and medical advice.He has gone out of his way to ensure safety and hygiene in his clinic which makes it an added bonus during the Covid situation. In my understanding, he has only been treating patients in critical need of dental care for safety and well-being of all involved.He postponed cosmetic procedures like scaling etc as they weren't pertinent during RCT which says a lot about his earnesty of approach. I got a lot of pain relief in one sitting. Would definitely recommend.
reply_text: Thanks for the positive feedback.We hope your dental pain is completely relieved by now. Regards and keep smiling :)
